meanings.definition: A person who makes or repairs thatched roofs.
meanings.sent1: The thatchers in the village are skilled at repairing roofs.
meanings.sent2: We hired some thatchers to fix the roof of our cottage.
meanings.sent3: The thatchers had a race to see who could fix the roof the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The thatchers weaved the straw together like expert craftsmen.
meanings.sent5: The thatchers worked tirelessly under the hot sun to complete the roof.

meanings.sent1: The group of thatchers gathered to discuss their next project.
meanings.sent2: I saw a team of thatchers working on the barn's roof.
meanings.sent3: The thatchers formed a band and sang songs about roofs.
meanings.sent4: The thatchers stood out in the field like a flock of birds.
meanings.sent5: The thatchers' tools clinked together as they worked in harmony.
